description:
The El Morro Pant takes cues from the comfort of their Layover Series blended with the function of Run Amok.
The El Morro series is constructed from a Nylon Viscose Stretch double face fleece. This delivers the protective and functional performance of nylon with a premium and technical look and feel. Clean seam construction, unique paneling, and flat single-ply elastic waistband with drawstring deliver on the sleek performance aesthetic, while the weighted fabric with the reverse faced zipper pockets add function to this fleece jogger. Mesh lined front pocket offer breathability when the pocket are zipped open. Elastic hem bands finish the shorter length and trim fit of the jogger silhouette. Reflective branding elements finish the technical look of these bottoms.
The El Morro Jogger was meant to fit and function like your everyday pant while adding the relaxed comfort of fleece and technical feel of a performance jogger..
name: Roark El Morro Fleece Pants - Mens
